content: I’m a pre-final year M.S. student in College of Computer Science and Technology at Zhejiang University, advised by Prof. Guofeng Zhang. My research interests lie in computer vision and deep learning, particularly in scene understanding, such as intrinsic image decomposition, depth/normal estimation and 3D plane reconstruction.
summary: I’m a pre-final year M.S. student in College of Computer Science and Technology at Zhejiang University, advised by Prof. Guofeng Zhang. My research interests lie in computer vision and deep learning, particularly in scene understanding, such as intrinsic image decomposition, depth/normal estimation and 3D plane reconstruction.
title: Jundan Luo

content: Our goal is to resolve two main problems in shading estimation:  Distinguishing shading from reflectance -> inductive biases from surface normal estimation Lack of training data -> inductive transfer learning
summary: The project leverages deep neural networks to decompose an indoor single image into a shading image and a reflectance image.
title: Inductive transfer learning from surface normal estimation for intrinsic image decomposition

content: There are two main problems:  Noisy and semi-dense 3D point clouds. Real-time speed requirement.
summary: The project provides multiple robust plane models with boundaries for the AR SDK user.
title: Real-time Multi-Plane 3D Reconstruction in Indoor Scenes on Mobile Platform

summary: The AR shooting game takes place in multiple planar regions in the real world. Move your phone to watch the rabbits and shoot!
title: Jumping Rabbits! -- an AR shooting game taken place on real-world planes
